attribute_definition_groups.name: YouTube player Configuration
attribute_definition_groups.description: You can define the source and title for the video, height and width attributes to specify the size of the iframe.

attribute_definitions.name: YouTube player source
attribute_definitions.description: Source to the video shown by the video player.

attribute_definitions.name: YouTube player title
attribute_definitions.description: Title attribute is used by screen readers to read out what the content of the iframe is.
